content: sweet caroline is a mini cal crochet a-long designed to celebrate ten thousand members on my facebook group helen s hookaholics 1 a cushion cover or a large afghan square it is up to you each square will measure approx 20 inches/50cm perfect for a cushion the square also fits with any of my afghan squares so it can be used alone or with a mix of smaller blocks to make a sweet blanket i designed this as a stash buster so you can use up all those odd little bits and pieces you have left from other projects so add it to your projects show it some love and come join in the fun there are 3 parts to the pattern part 1 2 part 2 3 part 3 4 1 https //www facebook com/groups/helenshookaholics/ 2 http //www crystalsandcrochet com/sweet-caroline-part-1/ 3 http //www crystalsandcrochet com/crochet/sweet-caroline-part-2 4 http //www crystalsandcrochet com/crochet/sweet-caroline-part-3/
